virtual const iprm::IOptionsList* iimg::CBitmapDocument::GetBitmapListInfo ( ) const [virtual]

Get optional information about bitmaps in form of section constraints.

It allows to get name and description of each bitmap channel.

Implements iimg::IMultiBitmapProvider.

virtual istd::IChangeable* iimg::CBitmapDocument::InsertPage ( const QString &  pageTitle = QString(),
const QSizeF &  pageSize = QSizeF(),
int  position = -1 
) [virtual]

Insert a new document page at the given position.

Parameters:
pageTitle- Title of the page.
pageSize- Physical dimension of the page in mm.
Insertionposition in the page container. If this value is negative, the new page will be inserted after the last page of the document.

Implements idoc::IMultiPageDocument.
